tidbits.title: Lake Bled's Idyllic Beauty
tidbits.description: Slovenia is home to the picturesque Lake Bled, featuring a charming island with a church, a medieval castle perched on a hill, and stunning Alpine views.

tidbits.title: Lipizzaner Horses
tidbits.description: Slovenia is known for its Lipizzaner horses, bred for the Spanish Riding School in Vienna. The Lipica Stud Farm preserves this proud tradition.

tidbits.title: Underground Wonders in Škocjan Caves
tidbits.description: Explore the breathtaking Škocjan Caves, a UNESCO World Heritage site, featuring massive underground chambers, bridges, and one of the world's largest underground canyons.
